name: Etch
description: Etch accelerates business transformation with innovative digital solutions, empowering organizations for over 20 years to revolutionize operations, enhance customer value, and achieve exponential growth. Our strategic approach and swift delivery optimize collaboration and efficiency, pioneering management principles for continuous improvement and breakthrough performance in partnership with clients.
features: We help you to develop a customer-centric strategy that translates your purpose and business objectives into action.
We make engaging, intuitive experiences that captivate people and drive business impact.
We help you to connect with your target audience meaningfully, across the full digital channel mix.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Digital transformation at extraordinary speed
ShortDescription: Your partner for delivering digital customer experiences at scale

Highlights.name: Delivery by design
Highlights.description: We combine Design Thinking and Agile Development to create collaborative teams, enabling rapid business change and delivering impressive results in delivery.

Highlights.name: Community driven
Highlights.description: Specialist digital expertise on demand, to help solve any problem for any business.

Highlights.name: Intensely collaborative
Highlights.description: We encourage frequent experimentation and open communication to achieve rapid problem-solving, fostering continuous innovation and faster, better decision-making.

enhanced_description: Etch accelerates business transformation with innovative digital solutions, leveraging over 20 years of experience to empower organizations to revolutionize operations, enhance customer value, and achieve exponential growth. As a partner for delivering digital customer experiences at scale and extraordinary speed, our strategic approach combines Design Thinking and Agile Development ('Delivery by Design'), fostering intensely collaborative environments for rapid business change, continuous innovation, and faster, better decision-making. We specialize in developing customer-centric strategies and crafting engaging, intuitive digital experiences to connect meaningfully with target audiences across the full digital channel mix, ultimately driving significant business impact. Within HR technology, Etch aids in boosting Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity through solutions for recruiting automation, data-driven hiring, and core HR/HCM functionalities, supported by specialist digital expertise on demand.
key_use_cases: Optimizing collaboration and efficiency within organizations
Creating engaging and intuitive digital experiences
Connecting with target audiences across digital channels
Boosting Hiring Manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Pioneering management principles for continuous improvement
Expertise in Design Thinking and Agile Development ('Delivery by Design') for rapid business change
Community-driven model offering specialist digital expertise on demand
Intensely collaborative approach fostering frequent experimentation and open communication
Capability for rapid problem-solving and continuous innovation
Focus on achieving faster, better decision-making for clients
Ability to deliver digital transformation at extraordinary speed
Capability to deliver digital customer experiences at scale
implementation_scenarios: Project-based digital transformation leveraging Design Thinking and Agile Development
Expert-led implementation of digital solutions including HR technology
roi_benefits: Delivers impressive results in project delivery
